title: Which illustrates defense mechanism of projection

content.prompt: Which of the following examples best illustrates the defense mechanism of regression?

choices.label: After failing an exam, a college student has a temper tantrum and tears up his books and notes.
Anxious about an upcoming election for class president, a high school student stops campaigning, saying that anything she does will not matter anyway.
After his girlfriend leaves him, a graduate student accuses his best friend of disloyalty.
A military combat veteran avoids movies and television shows with violent content.

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
